speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: It's not because I'm lazy, it's just because I don't care.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Regardless of our limitations, even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!

speaker: Shimura Danzo
phrase: Emotion leads one to hate... and hate leads one to conflict and war.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Love is the reason why there is pain. When we lose someone precious to us, it is a cycle of hatred that will not cease. You and I seek the same thing that Jiraiya-sensei wanted. Let me ask you this: How will you confront this hatred in order to create peace?

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: I could say I'm not sad, so I can't lie around crying about it either.

speaker: Sai
phrase: The best way to escape reality without running is smiling even if it is obviously fake.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: Lets see, how should I kill you?

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I will show you my own move.

speaker: Haku
phrase: I'm sure that the boy I killed, must also have grown up knowing the pain of which I speak. We are special. We are powerful. And we are feared.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! So there is no Suna, and no Kumo! There are only shinobi!

speaker: Anko Mitarashi
phrase: *to Orochimaru* This is no time to reminisce, Sensei?

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: This is what a real trump card is.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: You would think just this once, I could pull through.

speaker: Tenten
phrase: I want to be a great and powerful ninja! To walk in the footsteps of the legendary kunoichi, Tsunade!

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: I can't think of a more fitting destination for a demon ninja, I fear you're in for a long and very painful eternity!

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: Naruto... please save my little brother.

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: *to Naruto* You've just thrown it all away! Dreams don't come true when you're dead!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives, but how he dies.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: The curse represents a mark of the bird in a cage... It is... the symbol of being tied down to an inescapable destiny.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *to Pain* The people from this village are different from your average village. Even if it means dying, who would sell out a comrade.

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: *talking to Yamato* Same as always... I can only do the dumbest of things for Naruto...

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Hey, I'll take your chakra! You got that?!

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Because you're the only shinobi in the world who can surpass the Fourth. Thats what I believe.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward.

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: Stop it! How dare you disrespect an opponent that fought you with all he had!?

speaker: Genma Shiranui
phrase: When captured birds grow wiser, because they want to fly again.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Just because someone is important to you, that person is good. Even if you knew that person was evil... People cannot win against their loneliness.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Even the most ignorant, what they think… and they become real people.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Fear. That is what we live with. And we live it everyday. Only in death are we free of it.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: We have walked through the darkness of this world, that’s why we are able to see even a sliver of light.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Rejection is a part of any man’s life. If you can’t accept and move past rejection, or at least use it as writing material - you’re not a real man.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: It’s because we help out when they’re in trouble that we can count on them to come running when we need it.

speaker: Nagato
phrase: If you don't share someone's pain. You can never understand them.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Love breeds sacrifice... which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: Tears and rain, my body is unable to stay yet my heart is unwilling to leave.

speaker: Tobirama Senju
phrase: Grown-ups are idiots. If they really want to bring an end to this endless fighting, they need to sit down with one another and reach a truce.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I've been around longer than you have, it's not that bad. At least you and I have been lucky enough to find new comrades to help fill the void.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Laziness is the mother of all bad habits. But ultimately she is a mother and we should respect her.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: If comrades that you trust gather around you, hope can take physical form and become visible. That's what I believe...

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Because they saved me from myself, they rescued me from my loneliness. They were the first to accept me for who I am. They're my friends.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Kabuto: Isn't acknowledging what you can't do the same as giving up?

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Itachi: No, it means to forgive yourself for what you aren't able to do. Your comrades are there to make up for what you cannot do and to prevent you from ignoring things that you actually might have been able to do.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Once you question your own belief, it's over.

speaker: Haku
phrase: Forget about revenge. The fate of those who seek revenge is grim. It's tragic, the only thing that remains is emptiness.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!

speaker: Pain
phrase: It is only through the eyes of others that our lives have any meaning.

speaker: Ōnoki
phrase: Don't underestimate me! I don't quit and I don't run! You can act tough all you want! You're not gonna scare me off! No way! I don't care if I DO get stuck as a Genin for the rest of my life! I'll still be Hokage someday!

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Just by living, hate will also exist. There is no peace in this cursed world. War is just a crime paid for by the pain of the defeated...

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Never give up without even trying. Do what you can, no matter how small the effect it may have!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: I'll admit that you're stronger than before. But because of that, you can become Hokage. Never forget your friends!

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: The ones who aren't able to acknowledge their own selves are bound to fail.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: People who continue to put their lives on the line to defend their faith become heroes and continue to exist on in legend.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: No one cared who I was until I put on a mask.

speaker: Choji Akamichi
phrase: ....Would you consider dying together Teamwork as well?

speaker: Gaara
phrase: People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: You can steal the very last bite of my very best food. You can mock me all you want. But if you insult my best friend, I will obliterate you.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Three times now... We've fought world wars for our own nations, and I want to protect our world! But I'm too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: Now there's something I understand a little better. Hate, even joy. To be able to share it with another person... Naruto Uzumaki. From fighting him I learned that. He knew pain like I did and then he taught me that you can change your path. I wish that one day I can be needed by someone. Not as a frightening weapon... But as the sand's Kazekage.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil's fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: I'm no one. I don't want to be anyone. All I care about is completing the moon's eye plan. This world is completely worthless. There is nothing left in it but misery.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Either people change or they die before they do. It's one or the other.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: Humans... Do humans have a purpose when they are born? I have been wondering recently. Because they are born, do they have an important duty? The meaning of being born... For humans to find that answer... It is the one freedom God gave them.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: I have told you before, Chunin or whatever. 'Am I strong?' that's the answer I want.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I'm still Konoha's Itachi Uchiha.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world. The longer you live, suffering and futility exist.

speaker: Tobi
phrase: It's too late to regret. Reality is just cruelly moving forward.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: Man seeks peace, yet at the same time yearning for war... Those are the two realms belonging solely to man. Thinking of peace whilst spilling blood is something that only humans could do. They're two sides of the same coin... to protect something... another must be sacrificed.

speaker: Pain
phrase: People are stupid. If I don't do this, peace will come again. It will give birth to short period of peace within this endless chain of hatred. That's my wish.

speaker: Pain
phrase: When you give up, they're gone.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: Pain is the way to bring peace.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, lose in order to gain because life's greatest lessons are learned through pain.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Don't improvise what you cannot handle.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Even children are forced to grow up in the face of pain.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: It's human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: In society, tend to complain more.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Talking about peace whilst spilling blood, it's something that only humans can do.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, it actually hurts.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Getting dumped always makes a man stronger. But then again, men aren't meant to pursue happiness.

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: The hole in one's heart gets filled by others around you. Friends won't flock to someone who abandons the memory of his friends and gives up on the world just because things don't go the way he wants them to. That won't help fill the hole in your heart. And people won't help those who run away and do nothing. As long as you don't give up, there will always be salvation.

speaker: Tobi
phrase: If you believe in your dreams, that you can achieve your dreams just by working hard.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Not one wish ever gets granted in this world.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: If you don't like your destiny, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become... as strong as they can be.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: There's no advantage to hurrying through life.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts beside us.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.

speaker: Ohnoki
phrase: It's stupid to talk about things you're not. Be yourself and you'll be fine.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: It's because I've experienced pain in the past, that I can even consider what would be best for the future!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: Every one of us must do what's in their power! If we're going to die anyway, then it's better to die fighting than to do nothing!

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: When people have different opinions, you should apply the majority vote.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Failing doesn't give you a reason to give up as long as you believe.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: If the father's responsibility is to protect the child... then my responsibility is to exceed the father.

speaker: Sai
phrase: It's because Sakura loves Sasuke that she doesn't want him to sink any lower. It's because she loves him that she wants to rescue him from the evil path he currently walks. Even if the only way to do it is to kill him with her own two hands, she's prepared to do it because she loves him.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: People share only one common fate... death.

speaker: Shikaku Nara
phrase: Legends from the distant past are always exaggerated, someone outdoes them... that's when new legends are born!

speaker: Gamabunta
phrase: What's your wish? Peace? Money? Or the world? Whatever you wish for, it's something you have to get with your own strength!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: The things that are most important aren't written in books. You have to learn them by experiencing them yourself.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Someday, and spend the rest of my life playing shōgi or Go. Then die of old age before my wife.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Self-sacrifice... A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi.

speaker: Yashamaru
phrase: Love is... care and devotion you feel for the precious ones around you.

speaker: Hiruzen Sarutobi
phrase: It doesn't matter what you do, remember to protect the people that are precious to you.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: In life, nothing good comes out of hurrying.

speaker: Jirobou
phrase: I don't know which is more pathetic; the fool, or those who follow him.

speaker: Sasori
phrase: What's the point of something that disappears as soon as it's born?

speaker: Sai
phrase: A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, everyone takes it at face value.

speaker: Nagato
phrase: War brings death. And wounds and pain to both sides. There's nothing harder to accept, than the deaths of those you love. So you believe they could never die. Especially those who haven't known war.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: True beauty lies in things that last forever, never rotting or fading.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: People become stronger because they have things they cannot forget. That's what you call growth.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: [talking about food] The last bite. It is the final one, I will not give it up.

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: Peace under an illusion is not true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: My power isn't the Rasengan or Sage Jutsu or the Nine Tails chakra. My power is right here. [points to the center of his chest]

speaker: Gaara
phrase: It's never been The one who becomes Hokage will be acknowledge by everyone, becomes the Hokage.

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: In the shinobi world, those that break the written and unwritten rules are deemed trash... but be that as it may... Those that would desregard their comrades so easily are even worse than trash. And those who don't have the decency to respect the memories of their comrades are the worst.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: If you want to be free from your suffering, you will suffer more.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: I really am... shinobi trash. But the one thing I still learned is this. That void is something that everyone helps you fill. Just because you face adversity and hardships, someone will be there to support you!

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: In order to escape a road of solitude, and forge a new path with their own power.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Somewhere inside of me?! Take a good look, cruel world.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Rejection makes a man stronger.

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: Nine-Tails, you require a guide to show you purpose. That guide is the Uchiha! The tailed beasts are but slaves to those with blessed eyes. Obey!

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: In this world, and hatred is born to protect love.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Maybe, you might discover something of value in it.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: True power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart, it fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity one scarcely imagines to be possible...

speaker: Pain
phrase: We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice. But... if there is justice in revenge then that same justice will breed only more revenge... and trigger a cycle of hatred.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: How can you say that you will never change? That you will not change, no matter how great the pain you face? Can you continue believing in yourself forever? Can you guarantee it? Can you have such faith in yourself?!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Behind this mask is...Another mask! Pretty cool, huh?

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Listen to yourself whining and complaining like some sorry little victim! You can whimper all day for all I care, you're nothing but a coward!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: One day I'd like to become something precious to others.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: My motto is to be stronger than yesterday, even a minute ago!

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: While you're alive, you need a reason for your existence. Being unable to find one is the same as being dead.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.

speaker: Pain
phrase: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.

speaker: Pain
phrase: You think you're the only ones who matter. You think you can put off death. But that peace made you foolish and thoughtless. If you kill someone, someone else will kill you... this hatred binds us together.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Do you understand pain a little now? If you don't share someone's pain, you can never understand them. But just because you understand them doesn't mean you can come to an agreement. That's the truth

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *To Tayuya* How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint. It's the most basic thing, to land a hit with the second move.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *To Temari* It really doesn't matter to me if I ever become a chūnin or not, so let's do it.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: *To himself, I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: I'm the only one who can bear the full brunt of your hate! It's my job, no one else's! I'll bear the burden of your hatred... and we'll die together!

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Hinata... this is the unalterable difference in strength... the distinction that separates the elite from the failure. This is the unchangeable reality. From the moment you said you wouldn't run, your defeat was inevitable. The only possible outcome was your present despair... Withdraw!

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: [To Sarutobi] What nonsense! In the grand scheme of time, the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing...

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: [To Hinata At Chuunin Exams] So you're not going to withdraw? Then don't blame me for what happens to you.

speaker: Haku
phrase: {TO NARUTO} Oh, by the way... I'm a boy

speaker: Haku
phrase: Often people have it wrong, to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Darkness. When everything that you know and love is taken away from you so harshly. All you can think about is anger, hatred and even revenge. And no one can save you.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: He turned a room full of strangers into a room full of enemies with just one sentence.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: True Change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: If we fight again... We're both gonna die.

speaker: Tenten
phrase: The weaker you are the louder you bark.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Religion, it's enough to start a war.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Human nature pursues strife.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: All the girls in Konoha are so hot these days.

speaker: Yashamaru
phrase: A wound of a heart is different from a flesh wound. Unlike a flesh wound, and there are times when they never heal.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Justice comes from vengeance, but that justice only breeds more vengeance.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Any technique is worthless before my eyes.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: I will become a bigger badass than my father. And a stronger shinobi than my mother!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: To become Hokage is my dream!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: So shut up about destiny and...how people can't change! 'Cause... unlike me... you're not a failure.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Sasuke! Sasuke! Sasuke! What does he have that I don't have?!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Sasuke, I still thought this way. I always tried to lie but... but the truth is... I always wanted to be like you. I aspired to be like you. Because of that... I was glad that you wanted to fight me.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: When I'm with Iruka-sensei, I think if that's what having a brother is like.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Sakura-chan, don't you?

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: DYNAMIC ENTRY!

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: [after learning Guy Sensei's name. Might Guy] Yeah, mighty stupid looking guy!

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: Hmhmhmhm, I think I will play with you a bit before killing you!

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: Hmm... Itachi... it would be annoying if he moved around a lot. Perhaps we should cut off a leg or two?

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: I'll enjoy shaving you to death.

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: Konoha's Uchiha clan and the Mist's Seven Shinobi-gatana seem petty before his name.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: Against the power of will I posses... The capability of my body is nothing.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: [after Naruto does his Shadow Clone Jutsu] Oh, trash is just trash after all. It simply needs to be cleaned up.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: I don't hate the darkness. It was IN the darkness that I was raised.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: I've been wondering... There must be a purpose for people being born into this world. Why are we here? What does it mean? I've been thinking about it a lot lately. I realized that finding our purpose IS the meaning. That's why we're here. And the ones who find it... They're the only ones who are truly free.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: *referring to Orochimaru* I am not his pawn..! He is the one, the only one who ever gave my life meaning!! But how could the likes of you EVER UNDERSTAND THAT?!?

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: I will see the truth of this world... LORD OROCHIMARU WILL SHOW ME!!!

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: I see...since I am no longer going to be Lord Orochimaru's vessel, my duty is to protect the vessel.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: You've only seen one of my dances.

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: [to the Sound Ninja Four] Which do you prefer? To die, or to obey?

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: Is there really a god? If there is one, why does he keep me confined in here?

speaker: Kimimaro
phrase: If Tayuya comes back, I'll kill her.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: Akamaru, there has to be a part of you that remembers. Show me that you remember. AKAMARU! Forgive me. Can you? I know that I've brought you nothing but pain and suffering. I broke my word. I swore I'd always protect you. Akamaru I'm sorry. Sorry I wasn't a better master. I'm here. Here for you. Forever.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: I called you an idiot, idiot!

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: It's not bad enough they buried us alive in the oversized dung heap, but now they're stealing our chakra. You gotta give these guys credit for thoroughness!

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: A wall's a wall and there's no wall I can't punch a hole through!

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: Hinata, untie the ropes before you faint.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: I must be a pretty pathetic owner for you to have bitten me, Akamaru....

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: [Thinking] What a sucker. He doesn't know I can re-establish control over my puppet within a blink of an eye. It's what makes me an expert puppet master. And so what if Crow's body is out of commission? I don't need his body. Every part of him is a lethal weapon. [To Shino] Looks like you underestimated me, so you're dead.

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: You tick me off. I hate short people anyway. And you're so impertinent for someone younger than me. It makes me want to break you.

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: But I want to play around before some noisy people come!

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Gai...what I said earlier...I was out of line. I was being a self-righteous fool. I realize now that if I'd been in your shoes, either.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I don't know what this boy means to you, but I shouldn't have to tell you that we never bring our personal feelings into play. I didn't think you were capable of it.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I've lived longer than you. And times have been bad. I know the pain of loss. You and I haven't really been fortunate. It's true. But it could be worse. For me, you should understand.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Sorry I'm late guys, a black cat crossed my path so I had to go the long way.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: [thinking] If I'm still sane by the time I finish their training it'll be a miracle!

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: A ninja must see underneath the underneath.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Leaf Village Secret-Finger Justu...1,000 Years of Death!!! *sticks his fingers up Naruto's ass*

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Hmmm...how do I put this? My first impression of this group...you're a bunch of idiots!

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: [about the inefficacy of his attack against Tsunade] Did it not penetrate deep enough because of her fat breasts?

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: Mm, she's strong and scary. I bet she's single.

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: [About Naruto] Well that's typical. Not happy unless he's giving people a heart attack.

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: [when Naruto transforms into a woman in front of the whole class] CUT THE STUPID TRICKS! THIS IS YOUR LAST WARNING!!

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: [as a child] Why should I be sad?! My parents died protecting the village from the monster fox. They're heroes, it's because I'm happy! I'm not even sad that they went and left me all alone...

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: It seems like the small leaves in the Village of Konoha have inherited that will of fire you spoke of, Third. The fire on the leaves will eventually burn greater and stronger... It will flash its light and protect this village.

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: When a person dies, lovers... people who are important to you. They trust and help each other. The bond between the people important to you ever since birth and the string that binds them becomes thicker and stronger as time goes by... It's beyond reason. Those bound to you by that string will do that because it is important.

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: Billboard brow!!!

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: Oh, though. Those can be quite poisonous.

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.

speaker: Haku
phrase: I am of no more use as his tool. Please, kill me.

speaker: Haku
phrase: Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing...that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands... But don't you see? It's an empty existence... to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!

speaker: Haku
phrase: Can you understand? Not having a dream... not being needed by anyone... The pain of merely being alive.

speaker: Haku
phrase: That is when I realized that in all of the world no one needed me. I was alone.

speaker: Haku
phrase: I want to make his dreams come true...

speaker: Haku
phrase: Is there... somebody precious to you?

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I took the life of the woman I was supposed to call mother in the process of being born... in order to become the world's strongest shinobi... I became the incarnation of sand...

speaker: Gaara
phrase: It's too bad I don't think of you as anything. If you get in my way... I'll kill you.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!! MY BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!!

speaker: Gaara
phrase: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: People cannot win against their loneliness.

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: [When Ino visits him in the hospital] Hehe. I'm also the type that gets girls to visit him. Take that, Shikamaru!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: This punch is heavier than life itself!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: Chubbies rule!

speaker: Anko Mitarashi
phrase: Time's a-wastin' people, let's go!

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: You're such a child. You talk of nothing but pipe dreams... there are times when people must make painful choices.

speaker: Temari
phrase: *about Shikamaru* Amazing. This slacker-clown outsmarted me!

speaker: Temari
phrase: Sharpen your kama at sunset.

speaker: Temari
phrase: *to Lee* Get yourself and that loser out of my way.

speaker: Temari
phrase: *to Shikamaru* You are awfully fragile. What kind of man are you?

speaker: Temari
phrase: Wasn't much of a match...kinda boring.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: He was the one who taught me to deepen my bond with my people. Thanks to him, they will overcome this disaster and grow even stronger from it.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: This is where it all starts for me. Starting with this small bond. I too want to become someone who is needed, instead of a weapon that is feared. And as the Kazekage of Sunagakure.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I know him well. He takes too many risks when it comes to his friends...that's why.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: *to Naruto* I think of you as a friend. I used to think friend was just another word... Nothing more, I realized what was important was the word's meaning.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: *to Naruto* If you're truly prepared to take up the mantle of a Kage, you know what you have to do.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Peace under an illusion is not a true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: When did you forsake yourselves?

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Up until now, I feel that is what he taught me.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Perhaps the companionship of an evil person is preferable to loneliness.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: You're the same then. When you feel the honor of your idol under scrutiny... you become enraged, as if it were your own honor being questioned. The more precious your idol is to you... the harder you fight for him.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I shall kill you. I will not cease to exist.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: *to Sasuke* You have the same eyes as I do...the eyes, that long for strength... Just like mine. Your eyes tell me how badly you wish to kill the one who put you through the hell called loneliness.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I am a relic they want to get rid of, then there is no more a splendid universe than this one...

speaker: Gaara
phrase: The corpse's bitter crimson tears flow and mingle with the endless sand, filling the chaos within me - and making me stronger.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I finally understand... I'm alone. I won't believe in anyone, or love anyone. I'm alone.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: What does pain feel like?

speaker: Anko Mitarashi
phrase: I wasn't cast aside. It was my choice, and mine alone.

speaker: Anko Mitarashi
phrase: *to Orochimaru* But why? How could you do this!? I don't get it, I've looked up to you more than anyone in the world!

speaker: Anko Mitarashi
phrase: *about Sasuke* I don't care what the heck he is! If he stays, he...should be dead.

speaker: Anko Mitarashi
phrase: *to Naruto* Tough guys like you usually leave their blood all over this forest.

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: He was a worthy opponent! A man who lived and died like a real shinobi! Kisame Hoshigaki! I'll remember that name for the rest of my life!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: *to Kisame* A failure will win even at the cost of their own life!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: That's it, Lee! Let the power of youth explode!!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: When a man struts around like a peacock, he should keep his promises. Even if it kills him.

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: Gahh! Kakashi! You make me so mad! Why do you have to act so cool?!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: You have the gift of perseverance, and that's what makes you a genius too!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: Don't let anything stir you up the path you have drawn for yourself! Forge ahead in the end! Stick to it Lee! Make me proud! Be everything you can be!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: You worked hard Lee, my nindō has been to train you to become the most splendid ninja possible. That's a promise!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: *to Neji* I was a failure when I was your age, the elite genius. It's only a matter of time until Lee finally surpasses you!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: People call me the Leaf's Noble Gentleman!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: That's it, Lee! Run...run towards the setting sun!... But don't mess up your hair!

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: Look deep into my eyes and accept my sincere apology! Also notice my handsome manly features.

speaker: Might Guy
phrase: *to Kakashi* What is with your attitude?! We'll never be young like this again!

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: I kind of hate him.

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: If you fight me, you won't be able to recover. Forfeit and withdraw.

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: Never underestimate your opponent, no matter how small they may seem.

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: Even if it's been a while, you should remember your comrades faces. Why? Because otherwise you will hurt their feelings when they call out to you.

speaker: Shino Aburame
phrase: I hate explaining the same thing twice.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: If I kick enough asses I might even end up Hokage!

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: Let's die together.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: *to Naruto* You? Hokage? You can't even beat me! No-one's deluded enough to think that you have what it takes to become the next Hokage, though... I'll become Hokage in your place!

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: Don't think you can run away from my nose.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: Heh, but I'm always up for getting wild.

speaker: Kiba Inuzuka
phrase: Yahoo! Akamaru, let's do this!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: I'm gonna eat until I can eat no more!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: I can't forgive you for calling me fat! But even more than that... Not just for stealing the last chip... or calling me fat... most importantly I won't forgive anyone who insults my best friend!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: Fat!? I'm big boned!

speaker: Chouji Akimichi
phrase: *to Shikamaru* I won't let even YOU eat the last barbecue chip!

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: My master entrusted me with a lot, I wanna be as cool as them.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *about Temari* Subtle as a rhino... she might even be scarier than my mom.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *about women, I wouldn't want to know what you were like before.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *about girls* C'mon. You know what they're like. You can never figure them out. You never know where you could stand with them. The smallest things could put you in their bad side. Always playing little mind games with you. Trying to make you do what they want. They're just a big pain basically.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: When you have that kid, I'll have to protect it. So I've gotta grow up to be a cool adult too!

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: We're not stupid enough to go out there planning to die.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *to Hidan* That pathetic Lord Jashin or whatever isn't your God anymore. I am. The only one bringing down vengeance is me.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *to Hidan* See, you and I have different beliefs. I believe in the Will of Fire.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Ughh. Great. What's the point in setting the alarm if I'm going to wake up before it goes off? What a total waste. Now I've gotta shut it off but I don't feel like moving. But if I don't shut it off it will just keep ringing and ringing. Sigh. It makes me tired just thinking about the whole thing. Some mornings are such a drag...

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: I never really liked Sasuke, I'm responsible for your lives too.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Sometimes I wish I was just a cloud, floating along.

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: *about Ino* What a drag... I say a single thing against Sasuke, and I have to get that evil look from her eyes.

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: Who're you calling pig, you billboard brow?!

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: *to Sakura* You bloomed into a beautiful flower.

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: *talking about Naruto* I could almost fall for him.

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: Wise words, Guy sensei! So simple but filled with such profound meaning!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: The lotus of the Leaf Village blooms twice.

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: I want to show I can be a splendid ninja as well even if I don't have ninjutsu or genjutsu... I want to prove it to the whole world!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: Sakura, please go out with me! I'll protect you with my life!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: A rock thrown at a pole will not hit, it will hit! That is the law I used!

speaker: Tenten
phrase: Amazing... The brilliance of the blade... the design. They're all beautiful! I want to take them all home!

speaker: Tenten
phrase: Three members of Team Guy specializes in Close-Contact battles so I often render aid from the distance. I don't mind providing back up, but I was hoping to find new ninja tools that would enable me to fight on the front lines.

speaker: Tenten
phrase: You're gonna fight Sasuke alone? And you think all of us are just gonna stand here and let you?!

speaker: Tenten
phrase: Let's just say I don't like being kept in the dark!

speaker: Tenten
phrase: I'm not running away and I'm not giving up. I will save this child.

speaker: Tenten
phrase: I won't let that happen. You're not getting off that easy. No way! The people you and Raiga killed, ok?! You're gonna live and you're going to take some responsibility for all those people's lives you cut short!

speaker: Tenten
phrase: I can't stand weak and indecisive people!

speaker: Tenten
phrase: It's not because they're girls you know, Neji. It's just that those two are using kid gloves. It doesn't matter if you're a man or woman in battle.

speaker: Hiruzen Sarutobi
phrase: *last words* When the tree leaves dance, tree leaves shall bud anew.

speaker: Hiruzen Sarutobi
phrase: It is a place where every year shinobi are born, you still will fail. I am only one of a long line. I carry this title in trust for those Hokage who came before and those who will come after. I am the Third Hokage!

speaker: Hiruzen Sarutobi
phrase: I wonder...do you have it, young as you are... the Will of Fire?

speaker: Hiruzen Sarutobi
phrase: He has combined Shadow Clone with his own invention, too.

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: I am the Fifth Hokage... You've trampled on our ancestors treasure...their dream...and you will pay the price! As the Hokage, I will put a stop to you here and now!

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: *talking to the advisers* People like Jiraiya...and Sarutobi, believed in you and entrusted you with the village. Now it's your turn to believe in these children and entrust it to them!

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: Grow up... Death comes with being a shinobi. There are times when death is hard to accept, there's no future...

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: *to Orochimaru about Naruto* I will die before I let you touch him!

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: Why am I putting my life on the line? Because now... I am the Fifth Hokage of the Village Hidden in the Leaves!

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: Jiraiya, are you the one who taught him the Rasengan? Are you acting like a teacher by teaching him something he can't master? Don't give him any ideas! That's why this kid likes to daydream that he's going to become Hokage someday.

speaker: Tsunade
phrase: *about to fight Naruto* One of the Legendary Sannin taking on a snot-nosed Genin... I oughta be ashamed of myself.

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: *last words* Itachi-san... It seems that in the end... I'm not so terrible after all.

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: I get stronger in direct proportion to how strong my opponent is. I do not tire, and cannot be defeated.

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: *to Asuma* My massive blade, doesn't slice... It shreds to ribbons!

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: Sharks start out as eggs, viewing everything they see as nothing more than prey. As of today you and I are fellow members of Akatsuki. So be careful... of me.

speaker: Kisame Hoshigaki
phrase: I knew that from the first time I had to kill my comrades... Kill a Kiri ninja as a Kiri ninja. What does that make me? Am I a friend or foe? What is my purpose and my position? Where do I go? Where can I go? I'm well aware that my entire life has been a one giant lie.

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: *to Kakashi* I died as a human!

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: *last words* You were always at my side, Haku.

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: Even the unremarkable Demon of the Hidden Mist can die and become a real Demon in hell!

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: Uh uh...I won't be joining Haku. Where he's gone I cannot follow. We wouldn't be welcome where Haku's gone to. Hell's where WE'RE going, Gatō!

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: Well? Cat got your tongue? Are you so surprised to discover that I'm human? Even shinobi are human. No matter how hard we try, I have failed.

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: *to Naruto* Your words cut deep, deeper than any blade.

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: When you've hovered between life and death so many times that it doesn't faze you, then you may have earned the title ninja.

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: You're right. Those little people and their little dreams, why should I care about them?! I have my own dream!

speaker: Zabuza Momochi
phrase: When I was your age, my hands were already soaked in blood...

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: I used to always cry and give up... I made many wrong turns... But you... You helped me find the right path... I always chased after you... I wanted to catch up to you... I wanted to walk beside you all the time... I just wanted to be with you... You changed me! Your smile is what saved me! That is why I'm not afraid to die protecting you! Because... I love you...

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: I won't let you lay another finger on Naruto!

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: *to Naruto* You make mistakes... but... because of those mistakes... you get the strength to stand up to them. That's why I think you are truly strong.

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: *to Naruto* When I watch you, like I can do anything - that even I am worth something.

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: You're wrong, Neji... Because I can see that you are suffering more than me... You are the one who is confused and suffering inside the fate of the head and branch families.

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: Was I able to change myself...even a little, N-Naruto-kun?

speaker: Hinata Hyuuga
phrase: I will never go back on my word, because that too is my ninja way!

speaker: Haku
phrase: By the way, I'm a boy.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: My name is Uzumaki Naruto. I like ramen. I hate the three minutes you have to wait while the water boils. And my dream is to one day become a Hokage. Then everyone will have to respect me at last.

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: Sasori...your strength came because of your soul, not a worthless nobody who lets someone else pull the strings.

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: How well or poorly we execute our ambush will have a huge impact on this war and how many casualties we suffer. If you wanna protect your friends and family, the only thing you should be thinking about is how to make this operation a success!

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: *to Naruto* Aww, am I right?

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: I'll show you the real power of the battle puppet Crow.

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: I can't back down when they show me no respect.

speaker: Kankuro
phrase: *thinking about Naruto* This brat...I'm going to kill him.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Growth occurs when one goes beyond one's limits. Realizing that is also part of training.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: *last words* Forgive me Sasuke... It ends with this.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: *to Kisame* Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death. Be prepared.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: The people of this clan are all the same. You focus on the trivial, in this fog of ignorance. How can we evolve when regulation is all we know?

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: I've had enough, there's no hope left for this pathetic clan.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Don't cry, no matter what happens.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: You and I are flesh and blood. I'm always going to be there for you, even if it's only as an obstacle for you to overcome. Even if you do hate me. That's what big brothers are for.

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: *last words* Just when me and Kakashi were becoming friends... I couldn't bring myself to confess to Rin... I wish I had more time with everyone...

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: *to Kakashi* I'm about to... die... but I'll become your eye.

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: I believe the White Fang is a true hero!

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: *to Kakashi* I am Uchiha Obito and I will surpass you once I awaken my Sharingan!

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: I have already awakened.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: I don't understand what's going on, but I'll just pretend that I do. *nods head in agreement*

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: *to Naruto* Finding a new me, that is the lesson you taught me.

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: I decided I wished to be like you as well, one stronger than Orochimaru-sama himself!

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: Hehehe...you can't beat me. You have no skills, unlike Sasuke.

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: Little kids think life is so easy. That's why they go on and on about their dreams. That's why they never give up.

speaker: Kabuto Yakushi
phrase: Oh you look so beautiful... We're not here for a picnic you know.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: Don't worry, this will be over in five seconds.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: We're just some normal ninja, we don't want to see what's under your mask.

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: *to Naruto* Lord Jiraiya only had praise for you. He was always boasting about you, one of the Legendary Sannin...acknowledged you as his promising student!

speaker: Iruka Umino
phrase: So I acted like an idiot. It was tough, was it tough Naruto??

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: We are humans, don't you think?

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: You are weak. Why are you so weak? Because you lack... hatred.

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: If I can't do 400 push-ups, I'll do 2000 jump ropes!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: I am the Handsome Devil of the Hidden Leaf Village! My name is Rock Lee!

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: Guy-sensei is the coolest! He practically GLOWS with cool!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Stop calling me Ero-sennin!!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Baka, baka!! They found out I was peeking! Now my research is ruined!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: The only thing that can keep a fire from dying and give it more power, is wind.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: If I become as strong as you, will I really become like you? To die as a tool...that's...that's just too sad.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: *last words* The Tale of Naruto Uzumaki... yes... that has a nice ring to it.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: There, that ending...was a little better. The frog at the bottom of the well drifts off into the great ocean. Heh heh ...yep. Pretty damn honorable... pretty damn honorable...

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: *to Naruto* I think we all have to acknowledge you. Gamatatsu, Tsunade...and I... We all admit you've worked really hard. But I wonder what's pushing you forward.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Never go back on your word...and never give up. That's your ninja way...and as your mentor ... I have no business whining! Because the student's ninja way should be the master's too! Isn't that so, Naruto?!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: *to Orochimaru about Sasuke* Because it's no fun to train a genius!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: *to Orochimaru* You're wrong, is the guts to never give up.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: *to Naruto* Even I can tell that hatred is spreading. I wanted to do something about it...but I don't know what. I believe... that someday the day will come when people truly understand one another!! If I can't find the answer, it will be up to you to do it!!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: When people get hurt, they become hated and racked with guilt. But knowing that pain allows people to be kind. Pain allows people to grow... and how you grow is up to you.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Wherever someone thinks of you, that's where home is.

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: I'm not a pervert... I'm a super pervert!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Die! Just Die! You have no talent at all!!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: Shut up you flat-chested bitch Tsunade!

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: You are the strongest enemy I have ever fought.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: No one can determine another's destiny.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: The heavens will not allow a pawn who can only seek victory at the cost of himself to advance...

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: *about Gai* He's so childish. He acts like a seven-year-old!

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: *about Lee and Gai* As usual, I can't keep up with their craziness.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Because Naruto... you saved me from the darkness.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: All this time I've been called a genius, so I cannot lose.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Sasuke's out there right now, heading toward Orochimaru. We can't allow such evil to take someone from our village... that is not our way.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Naruto... Sometimes, your eyes are even better than mine.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Father, the birds are flying freely today... They look so happy.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: There's no method but death to escape this horrible curse.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: *to Naruto* These eyes of mine show me many things. One thing they've shown me...people's limitations are set, and unchangeable. Only a fool wastes his time trying to become something he can never be!

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Do you understand now? You have no way of beating me!

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Once a failure, always a failure. You can't change that.

speaker: Neji Hyuuga
phrase: Right now, Naruto.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: Try it trash! I'll return the pain a thousand times over!

speaker: Jiraiya
phrase: I am, you only need to flash that sexiness to have women fall at your feet.

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: WHAT?! Why wasn't he affected by my sexiness?!

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: SHIKAMARU! Beat her up with a 16 HIT COMBO!

speaker: Ino Yamanaka
phrase: There's no meaning to a flower unless it blooms.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: A soul needs a purpose to live...and so I concluded that my purpose was to kill everyone besides myself. I felt alive...

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I fight for my sake only and live to love no one but myself.

speaker: Gaara
phrase: *young Gaara attempts to slash his wrist* It's no use, the sand gets in the way.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: The Uchiha is a clan destined for revenge...

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: *to Minato, it's part of my plan...to start a war...to bring peace...

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: It will be a new world... A world of truth, not lies.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *to Sasuke* No matter how far Orochimaru fell, he still loved him... Now I know how the Third Hokage felt.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *to Sakumo* Regardless of what happened, you did the best you could. I understand that now...you broke the rules for all our sakes - I'm proud of you now...

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *to Naruto* You've become as strong...if not stronger than me.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Like the fate of the two who founded the village of Konoha... Naruto and Sasuke...your fates are like theirs.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: This place makes me think about the mistakes I've made in the past... and I've made a lot.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *to Orochimaru* I don't care if you are one of the legendary Sannin, I swear take one more step towards Sasuke and one of us will die here!

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I'm Kakashi Hatake. Things I like and things I hate...I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future...never really thought about it. As for my hobbies...I have lots of hobbies.

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: A genius, that is my ninja way!

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: *to Sasuke* I refuse...to let this happen! I am Orochimaru! I am immortal! I will not die here! Destined to discover the true meaning behind everything! Destined to take control of everything in this world!!

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: When there is a true desire in the heart and that desire is strong... That is when he finds real strength that even he did not know he had!

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Everything will be mine.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: *about Sasuke* When I watch this boy, and think how ridiculous it was.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: *to Sasuke* How impressive. A thousand foes stand before you and you don't even bat an eyelid.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: *talking about Naruto* This child... intrigues me to no end!

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: Hate only gives birth to even more hate.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: I want to obtain all the jutsu and gain a true understanding of everything in this world. The first one to mix blue and yellow called the new color green. I want to do something similar to that. If blue is the chakra, it would require an eternity. Only one who understands everything after spending such time on this can be fittingly called the Ultimate Being.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: *to Kabuto, talking about Tsunade) The best medicines always taste bitter.

speaker: Orochimaru
phrase: There probably isn't any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you.

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: Naruto's here because he's made up his mind. My resolve is nothing compared to his now! I'm supposed to be a ninja, but all I've ever done is lean on him and cry... I was supposed to change that... I came here and I thought I was ready. But I can't do anything... I can't say anything. The only thing that remains for me...is to believe in them!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: *about killing Sasuke* I... Sasuke... I... I thought I could do this...

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: I'm the one who made Naruto suffer the most... I've just been getting it wrong. Just been messing it up... I don't want to get it wrong anymore...don't want to screw it up anymore.

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: *to Sasuke* I... I love you with all my heart!.. If you were to stay here with me, just stay with me!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: I've always considered myself to be a true ninja...but those were just empty words, and all of you can watch me from the background!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: *to Ino* Didn't you know? Women have to be strong in order to survive!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: All I've been doing is watching you two from behind... Now, get a good look at MY back!

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: *talking to Sasuke* On that day, and I have friends but if you're gone... To me... It will be the same as being alone.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: In the ninja world, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I won't allow my comrades to die. I'll protect you with my life. Trust me.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It's one of the never-ending cycles in life.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *making excuses for being late, today I got lost on the road of life.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: *making excuses for being late, so I danced.

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: Naruto, but you'll bleed to death if you lose any more blood... Seriously...

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define reality. But what does it mean to be correct or true? Merely vague concepts... Their reality may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: If you want to kill me, come before me.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: You aren't even worth killing, foolish little brother.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: If you think I'm just a foolish kid ruled by his emotions, I'll slaughter everyone they ever cared about. And then maybe they'll understand what it's like to taste... a little of my hatred.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: *Talking to Naruto* Just shut up for once! What the hell do you know about it?! It's not like you ever had a family in the first place! You were on your own right from the beginning, what it feels like to lose all that?!

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: *Introducing himself to Kakashi, and kill a certain someone.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: I have long since closed my eyes... My only goal is in the darkness.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: The pain of being alone...is not an easy one to bear. Why is it...that I can understand your pain? But...I already have many people who are important to me now...and I can't let you hurt any of them. Even if I have to kill you!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... That is my ninja way!

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: You're such a loser, Naruto.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: Are you alright, crybaby?

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: Naruto... I know you're special but, I AM MORE SPECIAL THAN YOU!

speaker: Deidara
phrase: Shut up! I killed Sasuke Uchiha! And you're next, you art-hating sack of wrinkles!

speaker: Deidara
phrase: *Before killing the Suna guards* Look at those fools. They have no appreciation for art. You have to feel art. And true art... is an EXPLOSION!

speaker: Deidara
phrase: Art is a BANG!

speaker: Hidan
phrase: Kakuzu... Could you get me my body, pleeease?

speaker: Sakura Haruno
phrase: Inu pig!

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: Man... What a drag...

speaker: Hatake Kakashi
phrase: I'm telling you this because you don't get it. You think you get it, which is not the same as actually getting it. Get it?

speaker: Nara Shikamaru
phrase: How troublesome...

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: A true hero always arrives late.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: If he rips my arms off, I'll kick him to death. If he rips my legs off, I'll bite him to death! If he rips my head off, I'll stare him to death! And if he gouges out my eyes, I'll curse him from beyond the grave..!

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: I am strong because I have people to protect.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Foolish brother, and survive in an unsightly way. Run... run and cling to life.

speaker: Obito Uchiha
phrase: In the ninja world, those who abandon their friends are even worse than trash.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: And my dream is to be the greatest Hokage! That way, people will stop disrespecting me and start treating me like I'm somebody. Someone important!

speaker: Haku
phrase: When people are protecting something truly precious to them. They truly can become...as strong as they need to be!

speaker: Gaara
phrase: Not enough... blood.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: BELIEVE IT!!

speaker: Gaara
phrase: I want to be needed, this is what I've learned from meeting and fighting Uzumaki Naruto.

speaker: Rock Lee
phrase: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: I actually don't think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things... and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction.

speaker: Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki
phrase: The past does not exist to remind us that the future cannot be changed. It exists to remind us what the future can be.

speaker: Naruto Uzumaki
phrase: There is no telling what kind of pain will come after me, I'll continue walking because that's who Naruto is!

speaker: Sai
phrase: Even if I force myself to smile. It seems I'm the type of person who ends up being hated.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: In this moment, I'm enlightened by my intelligence.

speaker: Itachi Uchiha
phrase: Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions. Everyone lives within their own subjective interpretation.

speaker: Pain
phrase: Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it's like to contemplate what it is to know true pain. Because when I had nothing and no one - I always had Pain.

speaker: Sasuke Uchiha
phrase: (About Sakura) Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love? As for me, I can see no reason why she would love me.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: The longer you live... The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness...

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: It seems that you still want to dance but... You will not be able to make steps anymore.

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: I'd be lying if I said things are going according to my plan... but beggars can't be choosers, right?

speaker: Madara Uchiha
phrase: [Last words to Hashirama] As comrades, huh... well... if that's how... we... will.... *smiles*

speaker: Pain
phrase: Feel pain, know pain... Shinra Tensei!
